attributes.action: extend all arriva train journeys from Cardiff that terminate at Ystrad Mynach, to reach the stops as far as Bargoed or Rhymney
attributes.additional_details: The arriva train service from Cardiff often terminates at Ystrad Mynach, even though the earlier pick-up stations are further up the Rhymney line, such as Hengoed, Pengam, Gylfach, Bargoed, etc. There is no continuation bus service and taxis can be expensive and difficult to acquire. Please extend the train service to include the farther stops.
